item.title: [DRAFT] A Mental Model
item.description: Preface “What should I do?” It’s a question I ask myself a lot. It’s a stressful question, because if I find myself asking it, it means I must decide a course of action and I don’t want to regret picking the wrong one. As a kid, the answers were easy: ask mom, dad, or someone smartâ€¦they always knew what to do. As an adult, the answers are less clear, and typically, there’s no one to ask.
